content: Your profile indicates that you are not currently a member of the military. Ask a recruiter: Recruiting questions Each branch of the military has different standards. So be sure to state the branch that you are interested in. We wish you the very best. Please keep us posted. OAL God and the soldier, All men adore, In time of trouble, And no more; For when war is over, And all things righted, God is neglected - The old soldier slighted. Founding Member Original DVG & Proud Member, Rupterd Duck/Derelict Veterans
